name: Dungeon Alchemy Jajja WebGL
description:
Play as Alchemist exploring a dungeon!

We ran out of time therefore the game is: Game is buggy and unfinished!!

  • There are no win conditions implemented.
  • There no Game Over screen.
  • The bottom half of the UI with potions and mana bar are not functional.

Consider that you have won once you have clear the dungeon of all enemies.

Controls Action Keyboard Controller upwaxis 0down saxis 0leftaaxis 1rightdaxis 1cast spellleft ctrlbutton 0 Credits

Apoxs, Mia, Jay.
